subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Sean O’Hair took an aggressive approach in shooting a 65 and took the lead halfway through the Arnold Palmer Invitational at Bay Hill in Orlando, Fla. O’Hair birdied six holes and bogeyed one for a 36-hole total of eight-under-par 132. That gave him a three-stroke lead over the first-round leader, Jason Gore, who shot even-par 70.
